homeHeader.title: Trade Smarter, Scale Faster — Get Full 360° Business Support to Expand in Dubai Multi Commodities Centre
homeHeader.description: Keep complex local regulatory requirements, confusing activity categories, and missing documents from delaying approvals and stalling growth. With One Nexuz, you can secure your trade license within days, offering you access to world-class infrastructure, 100% foreign ownership, and 0% corporate taxes. Join DMCC Free Zone's bustling community of 90,000+ professionals, 25,000+ companies, and 85+ residential & commercial towers today to unlock limitless business growth and drive profitability!

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to issue a trade license in DMCC?
items.answer: Generally, it takes 1-14 business days to obtain a Free Zone license, depending on your selected business activity, legal entity, office type, and document readiness.

items.question: Do I have to be in Dubai to launch a DMCC company?
items.answer: No, we offer fully remote business setup solutions, empowering you to launch, operate, and thrive from any corner of the world.

items.question: What are the different legal entities I can choose in Dubai Multi Commodities Center?
items.answer: DMCC allows you to choose from three corporate structures, including an LLC, a branch of a foreign company, or a branch of a UAE company.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer bank account opening assistance in DMCC?
items.answer: Yes, our seasoned business consultants connect you with the ideal bank partner to set up a corporate or personal bank account, streamlining your finances.

items.question: How many visas can I get with a DMCC license?
items.answer: DMCC offers flexible visa quotas, depending on the type and size of your office.
